name: Monkey Business
overview: In your ten years as an I.R.S. agent you've seen every tax dodge imaginable. Maybe that's why the boss picked you to collect from Mr. Big. So what if the last three collectors never came back?! This Mr. Big can't be that hard to get, can he? To collect from Mr. Big, you must first overcome an obstacle or two. Such as: - An 8 foot tall 450 pound "Bodyguard" - Rolling and flying trash cans - Ferocious attack dogs Remember, it's your job to see that Mr. Big gets away with no MONKEY BUSINESS. Monkey Business is a "Donkey Kong" clone released for the Amiga in 1985. The game is extremely rare and is believed to be the first commercial game ever released for the Commodore Amiga.
